Subskills.name: Festering Cold
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by orb of frost.

Subskills.name: Frost Icicles
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of orb of frost icicles.

Subskills.name: Glacial Shredder
Subskills.description: Unleash a glacial shredder with increased size and damage. Icicles are now attached around the orb.

Subskills.name: Frozen Mass
Subskills.description: Increases the size of orb of frost.

Subskills.name: Icy Winds
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of icicles.

Subskills.name: Cold Singularity
Subskills.description: Decreases the orbiting radius of icicles.

Subskills.name: Coldsnap
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict cold break on hit.

Subskills.name: Hypothermia
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to frozen targets.

Subskills.name: Orb of Duality
Subskills.description: Unleash multiple smaller orbs of frost in an arc.

Subskills.name: Timeless Tundra
Subskills.description: Decreases the cooldown of orb of frost.

Subskills.name: Multicicles
Subskills.description: Chance on pulse to unleash additional icicles.

Subskills.name: Howling Ricochet
Subskills.description: Orb of frost bounces off of terrain dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Enlargening Frost Orb
Subskills.description: Orb of frost increases its size and damage over time while traveling.

Subskills.name: Chaining Frost
Subskills.description: Icicles from orb of frost chain from targets unleashing frozen pulses on hit dealing a portion of the damage.
